abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "HasCoordinate is true", "HasGeospatialIssue is false", "TaxonKey is Dufourea novaeangliae (Robertson, 1897)" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from CEPANN - Coleção Entomológica Paulo Nogueira-Neto - IB/USP 1 records from USGS PWRC - Native Bee Inventory and Monitoring Lab (BIML) 1 records from Vermont Bee Records Collected by John Ascher 1 records from University of Guelph Insect Collection (DEBU) 1 records from Essig Museum of Entomology 5 records from University of New Hamsphire Collection of Insects and other Arthropods 10 records from Centre for Biodiversity Genomics - Canadian Specimens 10 records from NMNH_material_samples 10 records from iNaturalist Research-grade Observations 12 records from Geographically tagged INSDC sequences 12 records from Leif Richardson Vermont Bee Specimens 12 records from Illinois Natural History Survey Insect Collection 13 records from Snow Entomological Museum Collection 13 records from International Barcode of Life project (iBOL) 18 records from hymenoptera 24 records from Museum of Comparative Zoology, Harvard University 259 records from Bee Biology and Systematics Laboratory
